official_title: A bill to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 to provide for an annual revision in the fees assessed for the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, and to modify the procedures of the House of Representatives and the Senate for consideration of fee adjustments proposed by the Secretary of Energy.
short_title: Nuclear Waste Management Fee Adjustment Procedures Act of 1984

summary.text: Nuclear Waste Management Fee Adjustment Procedures Act of 1984 - Amends the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 to provide for the adjustment, following approval of a construction authorization application for a first repository, of the fees assessed for the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel. Bases such adjustments on construction costs occurring during the previous year. Sets forth procedures for congressional consideration of such annual fee adjustments.

titles.title: Nuclear Waste Management Fee Adjustment Procedures Act of 1984

A bill to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 to provide for an annual revision in the fees assessed for the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, and to modify the procedures of the House of Representatives and the Senate for consideration of fee adjustments proposed by the Secretary of Energy.
